description: a(n) = smallest number > a(n-1) such that a(1)*a(2)*...*a(n) - 1 is a prime.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..200
mathematica: seq={3};Do[n=Last[seq]+1;While[!PrimeQ[n Times@@seq-1],n++]; AppendTo[ seq,n];,{60}];seq (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 21 2011 *)
author: _Felice Russo_, Dec 21 1999
